data.title: best coffee in town
data.text: Simply amazing. Great atmosphere and best coffee in town. Perfect extraction time on their machine and quick service every time I've gone. Great place to take a lunch date or for a quick caffeine jolt in the morning. Parking can be a minor issue at peak hours but at most you'll have to park a minute walk down the street (and who likes going to an empty cafe anyways!)

data.title: Cozy little restaurant & bakery.
data.text: Stopped in during the Tap Into Odessa Event which was just before their grand opening.  Had a great chicken salad piled on top of 1/2 of an avocado.  Delicious.  It was also available in a wrap.  Very friendly staff and nice atmosphere.  Lots of yummy looking baked goods available too although we didn't try any during this visit.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Nice to have another place to eat downtown. Good food, nice atmosphere. Same problem here as for most Odessa eateries, need better service. The food is good though.
